author: Harry Johnson
description: Well-balanced bitter-sweetness dominated by vermouth (hence the name) with faint maraschino but perhaps the most important ingredient is the most hidden, the dashes of bitters. Hence, dash well and judiciously.
name: Vermouth Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
